title: Akbar
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Standard Japanese style North Indian menu with a selection of vegetarian dishes like spinach curry, chick pea curry, and others (likely uses ghee/clarified butter - vegans must ask). Lunch time vegetarian plate (two curries, sweet yoghurt, small salad starter, and hot/cold drink with naan or rice) costs approx. 1200 yen.
